trigger.match: * tells you 'Seek * out somewhere in the vicinity'
trigger.name: mobcapture

trigger.match: You have imbued a new spell to the potion.
trigger.name: brewfail
trigger.send: local brew brew= GetVariable("brewCounter") if brew==nil then brew=1 else brew = brew + 1 end SetVariable ("brewCounter", brew) SaveState()

trigger.match: * DISARMS you but your weapon's curse prevents it from falling.
trigger.name: disarm

trigger.match: The Avalanche Slalom is covered with dry powder snow.
trigger.name: icefall
bbgrouptrig
trigger.send: Execute ("sa %1 %2 %1+%2") local hour = %1 local minute = %2 local math = hour+minute Send ("t bamboo bb invite " , math) EnableTrigger("bbgrouptrig", false)

trigger.match: The vision shimmers for a while and then fades .............
trigger.name: disablescryfind
trigger.send: EnableTrigger("scryfind", false) EnableTrigger("scryfind2", false) print("off") Execute("pgo")

trigger.match: You have imbued a new spell to the scroll.
trigger.name: scribesuccess
trigger.send: local scribes scribes= GetVariable("scribesCounter") if scribes==nil then scribes=1 else scribes = scribes + 1 end SetVariable ("scribesCounter", scribes) SaveState()

trigger.name: tellpath
trigger.send: print("%1".."%2".."%3") tellvar = "%1" print ("tellvar " .. tellvar) Execute("mapper showroom " .. %2) Execute("mapper where %3") vPath = world.GetPluginVariable("b6eae87ccedd84f510b74714", "kerimwhere") Execute("t " .. tellvar .." Room " .. %2 .. " " .. vPath)

trigger.match: Bamboo has invited you to join group:*
trigger.name: bbgroupaccept
autoskinondeath
trigger.send:
require 'gmcphelper'
if (gmcp("char.status.pos")) ~= "Fighting" then print ("not fighting") else print ("fighting") Execute("skin cloak") end

trigger.name: retreatcounterall
trigger.send: local retreats retreats= GetVariable("retreatCounter") if retreats==nil then retreats=1 else retreats = retreats + 1 end SetVariable ("retreatCounter", retreats) SaveState()

trigger.name: linkdead
trigger.send: local char = "%1" Execute("echo has cut ".. char .."'s link - (linkdead)")

trigger.name: offcharge
trigger.send: Execute ("tracker " .. "%1" .. " @YLEAVES - @W".."%3") local dirs dirs = "%3" -- Execute ("say " .. dirs) local tanky tanky= GetVariable("tank") -- Execute ("say " .. tanky) if tanky=="%1" then Execute ("ch " .. dirs) end
gt @RPK@W I am PK bait - wanted flag active

trigger.match: You light Tendrils of the Void and hold it.
A powerful blast of magic hits you! When you recover, you find yourself somewhere else.
trigger.name: keritrans

trigger.send: local char = "%1" Execute("echo WB ".. char ..", link stable now?")

trigger.match: Your brilliant white aura of sanctuary shimmers and is gone.
The blood sears your throat, but your wounds quickly heal, albeit with an ugly black scar.
You sense that * is scrying you.
You killed a Trivia Point bonus mob!! Trivia point added.
You hear a voice telling you to drink a Shadow Titan's blood, and you oblige.
* tells you 'of * which is in the general area'
trigger.name: roomcapture
scryfind2
trigger.send: counter = 1 local room=GetVariable("kgmcproomname") while counter == 1 do print("%1") room = "%1" SetVariable("kgmcproomname", room) counter = counter +1 EnableTrigger("scryfind", false) EnableTrigger("scryfind2", false) end EnableTrigger("scryfind", false) EnableTrigger("scryfind2", false)

trigger.match: ## You may now take another campaign.
trigger.name: cpready
grouptellinvite
trigger.send: require 'gmcphelper' if gmcp("group.leader") == "Kerith" then Send("group invite %1") end

trigger.match: The Aardwolf Lottery was just drawn. See the latest note on 'board lottery' for the lucky winner(s).
Screaming in agony, you throw the weapon down!

trigger.name: infamymobs
trigger.send: require 'gmcphelper' require 'tprint' local testbb = string.lower("Bamboo") pigbb = 0 local member = "" members = gmcp("group.members") for _,v in ipairs(members) do -- print(v["name"]) member = string.lower(v["name"]) if member == testbb then pigbb = 1 end --if end --for if pigbb == 0 then Execute("gt @GB@RD@YF Sorry BB is not here right now, let KeriBot try to help.") Execute("gt @GB@RD@YF @RInfamy: @Y Some mobs roam but..@WL1:@Y Cronus, Fufa, Vlad, Nimue @WL2 @Y: Cerberus, Rashyl, Grendel, Morpheus, Watfish, Morgan le Fe, Cyclops, Thiol @WL3 @YMordred, Vlad, Rok, Cronus, Nimue, Grendles mother @WKnown Roamers: @YVlad, Thiol") end --if

trigger.match: The magic enchantment has failed --- the potion vanishes.
trigger.name: brew
trigger.send:
local brew local brewFail brew= GetVariable("brewCounter") if brew==nil then brew=1 else brew = brew + 1 end SetVariable ("brewCounter", brew)
brewFail= GetVariable("brewFailCounter") if brewFail==nil then brewFail=1 else brewFail = brewFail + 1 end SetVariable ("brewFailCounter", brewFail) SaveState()

trigger.name: scryfind
trigger.send: counter = 1 local room=GetVariable("kgmcproomname") while counter == 1 do print("%1") room = "%1" SetVariable("kgmcproomname", room) counter = counter +1 EnableTrigger("scryfind", false) EnableTrigger("scryfind2", false) end EnableTrigger("scryfind", false) EnableTrigger("scryfind2", false)

trigger.match: The magic enchantment has failed --- the scroll vanishes.

scribesFail= GetVariable("scribesFailCounter") if scribesFail==nil then scribesFail=1 else scribesFail = scribesFail + 1 end SetVariable ("scribesFailCounter", scribesFail) SaveState()

alias.name: myalign
alias.send:
require 'gmcphelper' require 'tprint' align = 0 chan = "say"
gmcpstatus = gmcp("char.status") align=tonumber(gmcpstatus.align) print("Current align is: ", align) if align > 874 then Execute(chan .." You are a twinky goodie, Align is: ".. align) elseif align > -874 then Execute(chan .." You can't make up your mind, Align is: ".. align) else Execute(chan .." You are evil af, Align is: ".. align) end
